name: Lucia's Origami (link in Description)
description:
Lucia is an origami magician who lived in a small village. The magic she is learning is very niche and going to be faded away. Though she tried hard to study, she can never do better than her younger brother Max. Her two friends, Winter and Sean are also having their struggles. However, after taking a mysterious fruit, they changed a lot. This made Lucia decided to start a journey to find the cure.  You will help Lucia to complete the journey.

There are 5 endings in this game.

Finally

Thank you for playing! May I borrow a little space here to ask for your kind help by following me on social media if you enjoy my content? 

https://ko-fi.com/waitthkkofi/
